title: Entity Schema
description: Data schema to define a person or legal entity.

id.description: The unique identifier for the person or legal entity within the financial institution.

count.description: Describes the number of entities represented by this record. eg. joint customers should have a count > 1.

country_code.description: The person or entity country of residence. Two-letter country code as defined according to ISO 3166-1.

credit_impaired.description: Flag to determine if the entity credit quality is impaired.

cqs_standardised.description: The credit quality step for standardised approach.

cqs_irb.description: The credit quality step for internal ratings based approach.

intra_group.description: Flag to indicate that this should be considered an intra-group entity.

lei_code.description: The LEI code for the legal entity (for corporates).

legal_entity_name.description: The official legal name of the entity.

name.description: The name of the person or legal entity to be used for display and reference purposes.

parent_id.description: The unique identifier for the ultimate parent of the person or legal entity.

reporting_relationship.description: Relationship to reporting entity. See: relationship.

risk_group_id.description: The unique identifier for the group representing a single risk entity where no relationship of control exists

risk_country_code.description: Two-letter country code describing where the risk for the security resides. In accordance with ISO 3166-1

sic_code.description: The UK SIC 2007 standard industry and sector classification.

ssic_code.description: The Singaporean standard industry and sector classification.

source.description: The source(s) where this data originated. If more than one source needs to be stored for data lineage, it should be separated by a dash. eg. Source1-Source2

type.description: The designated financial or legal entity category this person or legal entity falls under

version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.

national_reporting_code.description: Unique identifier established by the national reporting system
